snippet.title: Apocalypse II (SNES) - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Get SNES cartridge at: https://www.pikointeractive.com/store.html#!/Apocalypse-II-SNES/p/43673357/category=14008398

If you have blinding quickness and nerves of steel, Apocalypse II may be your ultimate test!

Challenge yourself with this hardcore arcade shooter from Europe. The graphics look sharp, and adds to the Sci-Fi feel and theme. The game uses sprite scaling for the enemies, pushing the hardware limitations of the Super Nintendo.
Main twist of the gameplay is the speed of your reaction. The more you wait, the more tough a new enemy gets!

• 16 bit Graphics
• Fast Action Gameplay
• Over 20 levels
• Arcade high score point system
• Up to 4 players simultaneously (using multitap)

Complete in Box version includes:

• Cartridge
• Cardboard box
• Color Instruction Manual
